text:
🌾 Exciting update! ICAR has released new guidelines for B.Sc Agriculture admissions 2025. Check the official notice for more details. 📚

This update includes revised eligibility criteria and new course structures. Stay prepared, future agri professionals! 🚜

🍅 Krishi Vigyan Kendra has announced a new training program on sustainable tomato farming. Learn modern cultivation practices, pest management, and marketing strategies. 👩‍🌾

Apply soon — limited seats available!

🌱 Agri Expo 2025 is coming this December! A great opportunity for students and professionals to network and explore agri innovations. 🤝

Venue: Delhi Agricultural Fair Grounds.
Dates: Dec 10–12, 2025.

📘 New note uploaded: ‘Soil Science — Unit 3’. Includes essential topics like soil texture, structure, and fertility management. 🌍

Perfect for 3rd semester students preparing for mid-term exams!

🚀 Huge Announcement! 🌾 ‘Agri Minds of Tomorrow’ scholarship applications are now open! 🎓

Get up to ₹50,000 for your agriculture education.
Eligibility: Students from any recognized agri college.

Hurry, apply before November 10th!

📢 Job Alert! The Agriculture Department is hiring field officers. 👨‍🌾

Eligibility: B.Sc Agri graduates.
Salary: ₹35,000/month + allowances.
Apply online — great opportunity to begin your career in the agri sector! 💼

🌻 Research Update: Scientists discovered a new drought-resistant sunflower variety! 🌞

This innovation is expected to increase yield by 25% under low-water conditions.
Read the full paper and explore the potential for sustainable farming. 📖

🧪 Lab Notice: Practical exam schedule for Plant Pathology released. 🧬

Check your department notice board or official site for the full timetable.
